Posts.Content: hi von :) i am also new to this site,just found out about it today i also got diagnosed with ovarian cancer in march this year and had my ovaries removed,i am now having chemotherapy to make sure it hadnt spread elsewhere or makes a return,well thats what my consultant told me :) i hope all is going well with u i find it nice to chat to peaple who are going thro or similar things to u as they understand more about it :) i have a friend that is on here and shes the 1 who introduced me to the site. I think it is great as we are all here to support each other :) takecare hun xxxxxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Hi I'm new
